attributes.action: Enact legislation to enlist ALL qualified doctors in the UK into the armed forces and locate them in District General Hospitals to work in the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Medically qualified individuals have held the UK to ransom for at least the last 10 years.  Many GPs have ended their contract and now only work as locums because they know they can demand more and more money for less work than they would have to do on an employment contract.  The current situation in medical services in the UK demands urgent, drastic action.  Anything less than conscription and deployment under military control will do nothing to remedy the situation.
